Attach Chrome Driver to Reactor

Source: R/drivers.R
set_chrome_driver.Rd

Attach chrome driver to a reactor object.

set_chrome_driver(
  obj,
  test_path = tempdir(),
  verbose = FALSE,
  port = httpuv::randomPort(),
  opts = chrome_options(download_path = test_path),
  ...
)

Arguments

obj

reactor object
test_path

character, Path the child process will have access to on the master, Default: tempdir()
verbose

logical, start the webdriver verbosely. Default: FALSE
port

integer, port to run the webdriver on, Default: httpuv::randomPort()
opts

named list, options to initialize webdriver with. Default: chrome_options(download_path = test_path)
...

additional arguments to pass to rsDriver

Value

reactor object

See also

Other driver: chrome_options(), chrome_version(), firefox_driver(), set_firefox_driver(), set_timeout()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
if(interactive()){
 #EXAMPLE1
 }
}
